name: King Bot
desc: The <color=#FF423F>King Bot</color> is at the heart of the robot party, and taking it to the goal will clear the challenge. Of course, you must protect it.

name: Electrolock Barrier
desc: <color=#FF423F>Electrolock Barriers</color> will block robots from proceeding, but they can be destroyed with explosions.

name: Firewall
desc: <color=#FF423F>Firewalls</color> are extremely tough barriers that block robots from proceeding.

name: Self-Destruct Bot
desc: <color=#FF423F>Self-Destruct Bots</color> can blow themselves up to destroy Electrolock Barriers or enemy robots.

name: Combat Drone
desc: <color=#FF423F>Combat Drones</color> can attack enemies, and are able to fly over Bad Sectors.

name: Bad Sector
desc: <color=#FF423F>Bad Sectors</color> are areas of corrupted data. Ground-based robots cannot enter them.

name: Key Switch
desc: <color=#FF423F>Key Switches</color> are activated when a robot stands on them, and will disable an Electrolock Barrier.

name: Gold Coin
desc: <color=#FF423F>Gold Coins</color> can be found on the ground and collected. Pick up as many as you can!

name: Berserk Bot
desc: <color=#FF423F>Berserk Bots</color> are affected by an unstable program and are running amok. They will destroy all robots in their path in order to reach the King Bot. Do your best to avoid them.
